mapper.select: select refund_id, cost_id, refund_comment, refund_status, created_at, updated_at from refund where created_at >= now() - interval 1 month
select A.refund_id, A.cost_id, A.refund_comment, A.refund_status, A.created_at, A.updated_at from refund A join academy_cost B on A.cost_id = B.cost_id where B.user_id = #{userId}
